wikipedia_page.main: Robert John Baptist Noel (born 15 October 1962) is an Officer of Arms (Herald) at the College of Arms in London. He has been the Norroy and Ulster King of Arms since April 2021.

response: In March 2007, Mill Hill celebrated its bicentenary. To mark the occasion, the school was granted a new coat of arms by Robert Noel, Her Majesty's Lancaster Herald."The Coat of Arms of Mill Hill School", millhill.org.uk; accessed 13 December 2020.
* Robert Noel, Officer of Arms (Herald) at the College of Arms

link_mentions.page: Norroy and Ulster King of Arms
response: The current Norroy and Ulster King of Arms is Robert Noel, who succeeded Timothy Duke in 2021.
The office is currently vacant since the promotion of Robert Noel to Norroy and Ulster King of Arms in 2021.
Robert Noel (born 1962) is officer of arms at the College of Arms in London.
Robert Noel may also refer to:
* Robert Noel (businessman) (born 1964), chief executive of Land Securities Group plc
* Robert Edward Noel (born c. 1942), American attorney convicted with his wife for involuntary manslaughter, see Marjorie Knoller and Robert Noel
